code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NavBar=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const userEmail=localStorage.getItem('userEmail');if(userEmail){setUser(userEmail.split('@')[0]);}},[]);const handleSignOut=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('userEmail');setUser(null);navigate('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"bg-gray-800 text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-xl font-bold",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"E-commerce"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"mr-4",children:["Hello, ",user]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSignOut,className:"bg-red-500 hover:bg-red-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded",children:"Sign Out"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"mr-4",children:"Hello, Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"relative",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded",children:"Account & Lists"})})]})})]});};export default NavBar;
